I recently finished my first run and I'm stunned. Even if it took me only 9 hours it entertained me like 30. The graphics are beautiful and polished. The Soundtrack is lovely and even has a great impact on the great story. The characters are impressive and well designed, except the "normal" citizens. 2K used the same sprites over and over again, but that's forgivible. The gun handling felt a bit weird in the beginning but you get used to it really quickly. You also have special abilitys, which I'm not gonna spoil but I can say, that they make the game a bit more satisfing and also funnier.

Over all I can say, that the game really impressed me even though I played it only for 9hours to this point. My second run isn't far away though. :)
这是一款优秀的游戏，但是并不是一款让人玩着愉快的游戏，整个游戏中，在如此明媚的场景下，我只能感受到一阵阵的压抑和寒意。游戏的角色塑造的非常的优秀，总体而言是一款值得收藏的游戏

还是一个风和日丽的下午，我已经记不清距离上次被震撼是在几年之前。无论是这个故事，这个场景，都曾让我回味无穷，再走一次，就像回味了一部老电影，多的是对人生的思考，深的是对亲情的感动。永远也不会忘记，天上的那座城市，哥伦比亚；永远也不会忘记，被囚禁的笼中鸟，伊丽莎白。

Now, the last time I reviewed this game I harped on the story major, so I'll harp on the gameplay first:

--Too many enemies are either bullet sponges, or hitscan death-fiends. No in-between.
--Choices mechanically matter exactly once.
--Powers are either situational tripe, or so useful that nothing else is worth using.
--Guns are standard-fare-bland-FPS weapons, with little variety in-between them. The alternate versions of the weapons are far too similar to each other.
--Levels are typically cramped linear paths, rails were not as fun as they could've been.
--one actual boss-fight in the game, [spoiler]It's not the songbird[/spoiler], and it's so cheaply made & executed that it was tedious and annoying.

Now, time for the story:

--Multiple anachronisms, they could be excused with "alternate universe" or "it's columbia" but it's immersion breaking for historical enthusiasts.
--Sells racism and sexism as a message, racism is consistent but sexism is not:
==--Female enforcers are common among comstock's troops, despite columbia's society supposedly being against suffrage among other issues of sexism.
==--The female Lutece character being the one who gains success in her scientific career, whereas the male Lutece does not is inconsistent to the game's messages about sexism.
--Alternate-universe hopping reduces tension for Booker & Elizabeth's quest at points in the game, for me, it was to the point that it broke game-immerison for me.
--for how sparse the explanation for plasmids were in OG bioshock, vigors had even less.
--There is barely any explanation or reason as to how Comstock can chase Elizabeth through time and space, despite being involved in the game half-as-much as Andrew Ryan was in OG bioshock.
--the ending is like game-of-thrones' ending- shoved in at the last second of an established fun thing, and sucking the thunder out of it.
==--years of actual gameplay-based work were gutted for the sake of [b]story changes[/b].
==--[b]Both burial at sea DLCs are even more ridiculous than infinite's main story.[/b]

I admit, the last time I reviewed this game was silly, bitter, and inconsistent. But now, It's more consistent.

Don't buy this game firsthand, and if you do, don't pay more than $10 for it.

Многим до такого уровня как до Луны. Притом многие игры заслуживают лучшего качества подачи, например та же GTA IV или Flatout UC.

This game is a wonderful addition to the bioshock world, with a gripping story, wonderful characters, and themes that would be difficult to handle in any medium. Buy this game. Seriously stop reading this review and go buy it. It runs on anything, runs great, looks great, the dlc is completely worth it with two serious story expansions that finish the plot of the game out satisfyingly, and the game is incredibly well designed with each weapon having a niche. My primary complaint is the lack of a weapon wheel in exchange for a two weapon system, which does not encourage experimenting, it encourages me to never put down the revolver and shotgun. 
But. Buy this game.

After well over 20 years of playing computer games and only doing a few reviews, I feel completed to write this, though it will be short. This is by far, the best single player campaign that I have played, both in terms of storyline and action. I am a FPS gamer through and through, and I have played from start to finish, several hundred over the years. Thought I am a super fan of the multiplayer games, I always love to take a break from the online mayhem just long enough to play what I hope to be a good single player campaign, and this game took the cake.

To be clear, I have owned all of the BioShocks (minus Infinite) in Steam for s number of years, but I never played them. I decided to give the first BioShock and try and played through the campaign on the hardest setting...I was hooked. After finishing that, I played though BioShock 2 on the same setting...AMAZING storyline. I purchased Infinite and started playing what is probably the best campaign that a game can offer. 

The action is crazy (you have to wait fora it a bit from the start) and graphics are really good, considering when the game came out, and the story keeps you enthralled to the very end. JUST when you think you have the game figured out, guess again. I won't spoil the ending for you, but it's a complete and utter mixture of emotions to the point where I feel I need to go in the other room, sit down and just contemplate what the heck I just went through. Wow. just...wow.

Looking for a great single player campaign and thinking about BioShock Infinite? Play it through in medium or hard and get ready for the experience of a lifetime. My favorite single player campaign has always been the very first Half Life. Sure, there are a thousand games out now with everything better than HL, but that was the first campaign where the enemy seemed semi smart! While HL will always hold a place in my heart, this game has blown my mind.

Simply amazing.

-W/B

Pros
+Excellent opening hours
+Storyline is genuinely an emotional rollercoaster
+Booker DeWitt is the gold standard that all FPS protagonists should be held to
+Elizabeth herself is an excellent character.
                      
                 Cons
-Introduces a ton of interesting ideas and storylines and then drops most of them
-Columbia just fundamentally isn't as interesting as Rapture.
-Combat is, while a step up from past games, still pretty boring, except now there's a LOT more of it.
15/10 game

几年前因为斗鱼老朱的直播而让我邂逅了这部游戏，这次夏促终于把它买到了手上，而直到今天才把游戏本篇过完，
不得不说自己挑游戏的眼光还是很准的[spoiler]~~~[/spoiler]，
当年只是看看那几天的直播，粗略了解了一下，今日攻略完毕后，才意识到这款游戏在我心中目前是最值得去回味的：

一是堇张刺激的游戏体验，在没有深入了解这个游戏之前，私以为这是个到处拾枪，然后强化枪支，最后天下无敌的ACT割草游戏[spoiler]并不[/spoiler]，
也许就是这个第一印象给了当年那个这么喜欢动作冒险游戏的我“致命一击”吧！

二是基因改良这个概念，说白了就是你可以在里面运用各式各样只会在科幻小说中出现的能力，这是生化奇兵这一系列游戏的共同点，也可以说是游戏本身的最大特色了吧，它使这个游戏戴上了奇幻的面具；
至于这些元素为什么会被加入进去，是为了迎合当今游戏发展趋势，以获得观众更好的体验么？不仅仅是。它自然有它更深层次的道理，你要去挖这个系列游戏的深坑的话，是能够追究出来不少东西的。

三是对历史的尊重，这款游戏，其实就是基于历史本身，对其进行的反思。正是有了Booker在Battle of Wounded Knee（伤膝谷之战）中受到的精神创伤，才有了游戏剧情的如此展开。
[spoiler]伤膝谷之战是一场美国历史上白人对印第安人的大屠杀，有时间的话不妨看看相关资料、电影，也许会让你更加深刻地了解这款游戏。[/spoiler]

四是必须得强调的游戏剧情上的造诣了，说实话，只是一周目的我在剧情最后了解到伊丽莎白手指断的原因的时候真的在电脑前叫了出来，是的，只需要这条导火索，我就把剧情所有的所有都给它引爆！
同时，平行世界这一当今大热的概念也在这个游戏中用得如此巧妙，
这游戏最有意思的地方就在这里了，那就让此世界的他去干掉彼世界的他会怎么样？很显然不行，这并不奏效，因为无论怎么做他都无法改变命运。

命运要呈现的轨迹可能是一套蛇形的线，但你不管做什么都无法改变线的那头！

最后，只想说的是：Let the circle between Booker and Anna be unbroken again!

My heart,my soul T_T
Amizing game though.
游戏唯一的。缺点就是战斗单一，其他满分

(一)
反乌托邦大概是现在电子游戏最老生常谈的话题了吧。
谈到反乌托邦最厉害最著名最耳口相传的，一定是生化奇兵系列。
从生化奇兵1到无限，舞台幕布一合一开，从销魂城切换到了哥伦比亚，从海底飞到了天空。
但要讲的故事一样的荒诞，一样的疯狂。

(二)
我的整个游戏过程，是异常压抑的。
我不怕美好只是空壳，轻轻一捏就灰飞烟灭。
我怕的是我坚信的善良实际是粉饰的邪恶，我怕的是过着自己所厌恶的一生而不知。
是的 我怕欺骗 
怕天使长着狰狞的爪牙，怕自由戴着镣铐与枷锁，怕盛世内里数不尽的腐朽与糜烂。
怕依循着欺骗而生，而爱，而相信。

但最怕还是
[spoiler] 我知道了真相。[/spoiler]

Bioshock Infinite is an FPS, story-based game where you play as Brook to originally find a girl named Elizabeth for a buisness deal later trying to help her get away from her "father." There's two faction type things one has a ruler named Comstock which is a corperation you fight against which is a religious type deal (atleast I think), the other faction is the Voxes which wants to get freedom and is against Comstock and the faction. This game also has loot and hidden items you can find around the world.

Pros:
* Great gun gameplay.
* Good story.
* Fun perk system with the loot you can find.
* Hidden items for when you beat the game or something extra to do.
Cons:
* (Opinion) I don't like the ending since part of it seems like it's just a cliche and some of it just seems like it shouldn't b e in this game.

Not many flaws and most of the game does everything well to perfect, I'd rate this a 8.75/10.

Hiç şüphesiz en sevdiğim oyun listesinde en başta yer alan bir şaheser.

Beyninizi yakan harikulade hikayesi olsun, birbirinden değerli ve sevilesi karakterleri olsun, çıktığı yıla göre görsel ziyafet yaşatan grafikleri olsun, gökyüzüne kurulmuş, 'ah keşke bende orda olsam' dedirten evreni olsun, her şeyiyle aklınıza kazınacak ve keşke bitmeseydi diyeceğiniz, herkesin oynaması ve o hazzı yaşaması gereken bir oyun -pardon, başyapıt.
so fun

NOTA: El servicio al cliente de 2k fue excelente y me ayudaron a arreglar mi problema el cual era la cuenta de usuario de windows que no tenia permisos para correr algunos programas del juego


HORRIBLE!! No el juego, sino el hecho que no inicie el condenado juego... No lo pude hacer correr luego de que juge 9 horas de la nada no inicia, solo se queda ejecutando unos segundos y no hace nada una porkeria completa y ahora no lo puedo reembolsar una lastima, si alguien sabe como solucionarlo agradezco me digan pls
Wtf the ending just blew my mind xD

[h1] [i] "Даже капля власти развращает людей". [/i] [/h1]
Прошел я значит только что эту игру, прошел значит к ней дополнения, атмосфера все дела, это знает каждый. И пока я не прошел ее до конца я думал что буду писать о том как мне не нравиться тир и геймплей, как я стреляю по тупым ботам ради кат сцен, какая хорошая графика, какая трава не проработанная в концовке. Но тут я закончил играть, и вот вообще ни разу не ожидал этого, сюжетный поворот, эффект прошел, удивление да. Этого мало, потом я закончил играть в DLC, и тут мой мозг уже начал кипеть, кровь из носа все дела, память -. Вообщем я ожидал что игра будет проще, и добрее. Обязательная к прохождению, а так же помните что первое впечатление о этой игре полностью не правильное. Как и в случае Life is Strange о минусах этой игры даже рука не поднимаеться писать.
Great Visuals, smooth animations except for some stuttering drops from time to time. Great story

這款是在2017夏季特賣的時候，猶豫許久購入的，因為生化奇兵系列自己久仰了，但卻沒機會接觸到，看了一二代的簡介，有恐怖元素在使得我這個膽子小的玩家不太敢嘗試，但是最後還是在特賣結束前一刻購入，原先打算從一二代開始玩起，但重製版一直當機的問題，只好先從無限之城開始。

一開始遊戲從風雨交加的小船上開始，到燈塔前讓我想起一代一開始也有類似的畫面，之後按照密語解開密碼準備飛上天空的時候，真的讓人很興奮這個設定！沒想到兒時對於天空城市的夢想（航海王的天城）竟然能在遊戲體驗到，之後熱鬧華麗的天空之城景色讓人流連忘返！沒想到進行到丟棒球才是遊戲真正開始的時候…

大概講一下優點/缺點

優點:
故事設定令人回味無窮！（平行時空的科幻故事）
遊戲世界充滿奇幻與驚奇！（美麗的天空之城啊）
可愛又讓人心疼的小夥伴（伊麗莎白♡）
酷炫的異能戰鬥系統（類似魔法）

缺點:
遊戲戰鬥過程蠻血腥的（這個見人見智，自己是還可以接受，但是身旁朋友無法）
過於繁雜的異能種類與槍種升級（雖然多樣的能力，但是戰鬥中根本沒時間深思來選擇啊，就那幾招打到底）
太多撿寶的地點（每次到新地點真的就是翻箱倒櫃…）

整體來說，雖然有上述個人不喜歡的缺點，但是優點絕對蓋過缺點，非常推薦玩家來體驗這款天空之城大冒險！
喜愛FPS玩家更應該要嘗試看看！！真心不騙！

Öncelikle mümkün olduğunca spoiller vermemeye çalışacağım.
Bu inceleme ne çok yüzeysel ne de çok ayrıntılıdır.
İncelemeye şunları söyleyerek başlamak istiyorum bir oyunun hikayesinin çok iyi olması o oyununu çok iyi yapmaz. BioShock Infinite de buna güzel bir örnektir.


Hikaye 9/10

Bu oyunun en iyi olduğu nokta budur. Paralel evren temasını en iyi işleyen oyunlardan birisi olduğunu düşünüyorum. Her ne kadar bu güzel hikayeyi anlatış tarzı güzel olmasada sonuç olarak hikaye gayet iyi. Her ne kadar bitirince mind f*ck geçirseniz de etkileniyorsunuz.


Oynanış 2/10

B E R B A T ! ! ! 
Bu kadar kötü bir oynanışa sahip bir oyun daha önce oynamamıştım...


Atmosfer 6/10

Çok güzel bir temaya sahip çok güzel bir şehir. Ancak böyle bir şehiri kısıtlıyorsan yani açık dünya yapıp gezmemize olanak tanımıyorsan aldığın tüm kötü yorumları hakediyorsun demektir.


Karakterler 7/10

Booker ve Elizabeth dışında ki bu ikisi ana karakterlerdir diğer yan karakterlerin ismini duyuyoruz ancak gördüğümüz yok. Ne kadar gerekli tartışılır, bana iki ana karakter gayet yetti.


Sonuç olarak 8-10 saatinizi güzel geçirmenizi sağlayacak bazen çok sinirlendirecek bazen etkileyecek bir oyun arıyorsanız tavsiyemdir ancak 50 TL'yi haketmez indirimi bekleyin.

Genel Puan: 7/10
Serinin en güncel oyunu grafikleri ve optimizasyonu başarılı bir oyun.Keyifle oynayacağınız bir oyun iiyi eğlenceler...
Очень быстро наскучило, вытягивает только Элизабет.

Söylenecek söz yok valla yasanması gereken bir deneyim...Yanlız PFS türü oyun seven ve oynayan biriyseniz oyunu hard da oynamanızı öneririm çünkü Medium çok kolay.Hard da yaklaık 12 saatte bitirdim.Bazı boss fightlar biraz sıkıntı.Ve oyunda ciddi mermi sıkıntısı var ve buda oyunu daha zevkli hale getiriyor çünkü oyun sizi sevdiğiniz silah yarine yerden bulduklarınızla yetinmeye zorluyor.Hikaye ye gelicek olursak,oyunun gerek başında gerek ortalarında kafamızda binlerce soru işareti ile ilerliyoruz ama herşey yavaş yavaş su yüzeyine çıkıyo sonlarda.Ve oyunun öyle bir son sahnesi varki,öyle bir son sahnesi var ki kanınız donucak,şoke olucaksınız.

+Oldukça güzel oyun müzikleri.
+Fazlası ile eylenceli oynanış
+++Mükemmel hikaye.Sürekli cevaplar aradığın gizem ve oyun sonunda herşeyin cevabını alınca yaşadığınız şaşkınlık tarif edilemez.
+Temiz seslendirme 

-İyi bir sistemde oynamama rağmen birkaç kez çöktü ama çokta sorun değil.
-Medium çok kolay Hard ise bazen sıkıntı olabiliyor ara bir zorluk derecesi olmalı.
---Eger Hard da oynuyorsanız bir boss fight da öldüğünüzde zamanı geri alınıyor ve o boss fight a geri dönüyoruz ama bosun canı dolmasına rağmen harcadığımız mermiler geri verilmiyor bu yüzden birr boss fight da çok ölürseniz ortada kalıyorsunuz.

Bu oyun hoşuna gidenler wolfenstein e de bakabilir...
This game is amazing, the ending is one of the most complex things ive every come across and I love it.

BioShock Infinite is my all-time favourite game. The setting and the graphics are beautiful and reminiscent of past BioShocks while also being refreshing and new. The story is so intriguing and you instantly fall in love with the characters and their relationships. The gameplay is similar to the other BioShock games, but felt very rushed and the fighting felt forced. But still, there's nothing more fun than Undertowing someone off of the map. I would 100% recommend this game to anybody looking for a good time.
神作不说了，7小时通关本体。玩完海葬，准备再来一遍！！！aaaaaa~~awesome！！！！

Şimdi ilk önce bu oyunu alırken incelemeleri okumultum ama diyorumki keşke okumadan alsaymışım oyunun sonunu ağzım açık oynadım izledim üstüne bide youtube dan iyice pekiştirmek için bidaha izledim yani bu oyunu grafik olsun hikaye olsun aksiyon olsun herşeyi barındırıyor bu oyuna ben 10/10 veririm hacı oyunu hiç düşünmeden alın hiç hemde

No probé las anteriores entregas, pero este juego es oro puro. Da igual si has jugado a los anteriores o no, este se adapta a los nuevos y a los veteranos de la saga. Me gusta mucho la estética, la historia está bastante bien llevada, los personajes están bastante bien trabajados (sobretodo Elizabeth y los Lutence) y la banda sonora es... Maravillosa. Un juego de la anterior generación que es casi perfecto. Me gusta mucho, lo recomiendo. Seas veterano o quieras meterte en el mundo de Bioshock, puede que este juego te enamore como lo ha hecho conmigo.

9'5/10

第一次写评测就献给生化奇兵无限了。
首先游戏画面和BGM真的是极好的，记得一定要按提示调好亮度才能获得最佳的游戏体验。一向不玩恐怖游戏的我刚进房子的时候画面黑漆漆的，还有一具尸体，反正我是有点怕。终于到了城市之后只见阳光明媚，风景正好，看来这游戏并不可怕嘛!然而当我看到布克自己动手干掉了一个城管的血腥画面的时候我是目瞪口呆的，这游戏的画风变得也太快了吧？？！！！然而这才只是开端，后面还会闹鬼，嗯，某种意义上来说。
不过说实话这游戏算不上恐怖，更重要的是，当可爱的伊丽莎白在你身边的时候，一点都不会感到害怕啊！！！！伊丽莎白真的是我活到现在见过的最棒的队友了！战斗的过程中不仅不需要你照顾反而还发会给你捡枪捡医疗包捡魔力药水，你倒下了她会给你来一针强身健体然后拉你站起来继续战斗，一路上偶尔还会把捡到的硬币抛给你，简直不能更亲切！她真的超可爱啊啊啊啊！
这是我第一次玩FPS游戏，所以战斗系统这种东西我并不会评价，反正就是我这种手残，调个简单难度还是很容易可以过去的，游戏里有很多枪给你用，还有各种不同的异能，有时候喝完药水发现这个异能没上一个好用也是好后悔，我刚才干嘛要喝它啊……
还有可以加分的一点是游戏里按N键有导航，这对像我一样路痴的玩家来说简直就是福音，所以虽然没有地图但是并不用担心迷路。
剧情我可以给满分！虽然我有点猜到主角的身份但是结局确实还是出乎意料的，这里就不剧透了。
总之这就是一个玩了不会后悔的游戏。
Perfect story!

Para mi, el mejor juego que he probado, nunca me llamo la atencion comprarlo, si estas viendo este analisis y dudas entre comparlo o no, COMPRALO, jamas te arrepentiras, es el mejor juego que hay, su historia, su argumento, dios mio es 
I N C R E I B L E 

10/10, realmente increible

This was a solid and engaging addition to the Bioshock series and it is likely my favourite of the three, though there is something to be said for the novelty and simplicity of the first one as well. The storyline is well crafted, thoughtthere are strange moments of forced interaction that are cut-scene adjecent where you are forced to perform an action, there is only one choice, and yet there is still no option for other behaviours. The characters are interesting enough to build some emotional involvement, and at the higher levels battles can require focus and occasionally planning.
